data.fullContent: In the past, the world was mainly agricultural. People grew their own foods and made most of their own clothes, furniture and writing implements. Even though it was difficult, people were able to meet many of their needs on their own or by buying goods from local producers. Today, most people live in cities and work in a service-oriented economy. We still need the same variety of goods to meet our basic needs. However, we don't have the time to make these items, so we must rely on companies to make them for us. This means that industrial production is an important part of this service-oriented economy. We must rely on industrial production technologies to support us in this way.

q1.translation: 在过去，世界主要是农业。人们自己种植食物，自己制作大部分衣服、家具和书写工具。尽管困难重重，人们还是能够靠自己或从当地生产者那里购买商品来满足他们的许多需求。
q1.front: In the past, the world was mainly agricultural. People grew their own foods and made most of their own clothes, furniture and writing implements. Even though it was difficult, people were able to meet many of their needs on their own or by buying goods from local producers.
q1.content: In the past, the world was mainly agricultural. People grew their own foods and ____ most of their own clothes, furniture and writing implements. Even though it ____ difficult, people were ____ to meet many of their needs on their ____ or by ____ goods from local producers.

q2.translation: 在过去，世界主要是农业。人们自己种植食物，自己制作大部分衣服、家具和书写工具。尽管困难重重，人们还是能够靠自己或从当地生产者那里购买商品来满足他们的许多需求。今天，大多数人生活在城市，在服务型经济中工作。我们仍然需要同样种类的商品来满足我们的基本需求。然而，我们没有时间制造这些物品，所以我们必须依靠公司为我们制造它们。这意味着工业生产是服务型经济的重要组成部分。我们必须依靠工业生产技术来支持我们这样做。
q2.front: In the past, the world was mainly agricultural. People grew their own foods and made most of their own clothes, furniture and writing implements. Even though it was difficult, people were able to meet many of their needs on their own or by buying goods from local producers.
q2.middle: Today, most people live in cities and work in a service-oriented economy.
q2.ending: We still need the same variety of goods to meet our basic needs. However, we don't have the time to make these items, so we must rely on companies to make them for us. This means that industrial production is an important part of this service-oriented economy. We must rely on industrial production technologies to support us in this way.

options.sentence: Today, most people live in cities and work in a service-oriented economy.
The population has also gotten much larger than it was in the past.
With almost every product we use, we depend on factories to make it.
This means that there are more job seekers than there are available jobs.

q3.questionContent: How were people able to get the goods they needed in the past?
q3.selectAnswer: people were able to meet many of their needs on their own or by buying goods from local producers

options.sentence: People depend on factories for electricity and water systems, which means factories make these systems for us by building houses and water towers.
Industrial production is good for everyone because it allows people to make things in factories, which means that everything can be made in factories.
The world used to be more agricultural, with people growing their own food and making their own clothes and furniture.
Industrial technologies will help us to reduce our production time and help us to get the most out of all our industrial processes.
